author: A_Brickset_user
title: OK
review: This is (out of all Bionicle to 2004) the worst set but only because it features 15 different creatures but you can only build on or two per box. So you basically have to buy 12 boxes to build them all (use extra pieces from other boxes)

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO BIONICLE (Accessories) - Bionicle Master Builder Set Review
review:
This is a very cool set to have and it's fun to play with as well. There're lot's of models you can build and each one is very easy to build. There're also no stickers in this set to worry about. The legs of this main model you can see on the front of the instruction can be moved and if you turn the tail on the back you're able to move the head up and down. The mouth can be opened and the arms can sviwel as well. As I told you in the beginning: It's a very cool set to have - even for pieces which you can use for future MOC's (My own creations and/or brickfilms for sure.

All in all this set is an great set and I would HIGHLY recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
